summary.Title: Embedded Cyber Security Specialist
summary.Presentation:
If you love working with Cyber Security and Embedded Systems you could be exactly the one we are looking for!

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
If you love working with Cyber Security and Embedded Systems you could be exactly the one we are looking for!

In Prevas we are expanding our Cyber Security Team with focus on analysing, advising, implementing, and maintaining security related issues for our Linux customer and in our own industrial Linux platform. We work with medical devices, Industrial controllers and IoT with different connectivity and placed in critical infrastructures as well as standard consumer networks.

You are experienced with most of the following:

  • Microprocessor Security architectures like ARM Trustzone, Intel Security Essentials etc.
  • Embedded secure boot concepts:
    • anchoring chain of trust in hardware on both ARM and x86
    • bootloader, kernel, filesystem trust validation.
  • Linux kernel security features.
  • Hardening of bootloader, kernel and filesystems
  • Experience with Yocto build system for embedded targets and enabling security features in this.
  • Architecture and design with Cyber Security design principles, e.g.
    • Minimize Attack Surface Area, Least Privilege, Separation of Duties, Defense in Depth
  • Knowledge about security vulnerabilities CVE's, exploits methods etc.
  • Embedded Secure storage - OPTEE with support for credentials and certificates

The Cyber Security Team is a cross-region team in Prevas and your place of work could be either in Aarhus, Herlev or Aalborg depending on where you live.

About Prevas

We are embedded in our DNA and we are focused on being the preferred provider of embedded development to our customers. We often work very closely with our customers, and as Prevas employee, you will often come into close contact with many different customers’ development departments, either as project member at our office, or on-site in the customer’s development team.

We have an informal corporate culture with great opportunity for influence as well as great opportunities for personal- and competence development in some of the industry’s most exciting and challenging development projects. We believe that a balance between work and private life is a prerequisite for efficiency and creativity in the office.

If you have a passion for embedded cyber security, please send us an application via the form here. We will continuously be conducting interviews. If you need more information or you have questions, please contact VP Technology Peter Aagaard Kristensen, via e-mail: peter.kristensen@prevas.dk or tel: +45 51 54 33 66.

If you love working with Cyber Security and Embedded Systems you could be exactly the one we are looking for!

In Prevas we are expanding our Cyber Security Team with focus on analysing, advising, implementing, and maintaining security related issues for our Linux customer and in our own industrial Linux platform. We work with medical devices, Industrial controllers and IoT with different connectivity and placed in critical infrastructures as well as standard consumer networks.

You are experienced with most of the following:

  • Microprocessor Security architectures like ARM Trustzone, Intel Security Essentials etc.
  • Embedded secure boot concepts:
    • anchoring chain of trust in hardware on both ARM and x86
    • bootloader, kernel, filesystem trust validation.
  • Linux kernel security features.
  • Hardening of bootloader, kernel and filesystems
  • Experience with Yocto build system for embedded targets and enabling security features in this.
  • Architecture and design with Cyber Security design principles, e.g.
    • Minimize Attack Surface Area, Least Privilege, Separation of Duties, Defense in Depth
  • Knowledge about security vulnerabilities CVE's, exploits methods etc.
  • Embedded Secure storage - OPTEE with support for credentials and certificates

The Cyber Security Team is a cross-region team in Prevas and your place of work could be either in Aarhus, Herlev or Aalborg depending on where you live.

We are embedded in our DNA and we are focused on being the preferred provider of embedded development to our customers. We often work very closely with our customers, and as Prevas employee, you will often come into close contact with many different customers’ development departments, either as project member at our office, or on-site in the customer’s development team.

We have an informal corporate culture with great opportunity for influence as well as great opportunities for personal- and competence development in some of the industry’s most exciting and challenging development projects. We believe that a balance between work and private life is a prerequisite for efficiency and creativity in the office.

If you have a passion for embedded cyber security, please send us an application via the form here. We will continuously be conducting interviews. If you need more information or you have questions, please contact VP Technology Peter Aagaard Kristensen, via e-mail: peter.kristensen@prevas.dk or tel: +45 51 54 33 66.
